metadata.title: CVE-2024-28458 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in swfdump in swftools 0.9.2 allowsattackers to crash the appliation via the function compileSWFActionCode inaction/actioncompiler.c.

criterions.comment: swftools package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
